an5.28:2.4: nhāpako → nahāpako (bj, pts1ed) | nhānīyacuṇṇāni → nahāniyacuṇṇāni (bj, pts1ed); nhāniyacuṇṇāni (sya-all) | Sāyaṁ → saṁsā (si); sā’ssa (pts1ed) | nhānīyapiṇḍi → nahāniyapiṇḍi (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | paggharinī → paggharati (sya-all, pts1ed)
an5.28:3.4: ubbhidodako → ubbhitodako (sya-all, km, mr) | dhāraṁ nānuppaveccheyya → devo ca na kālena … anuppaveccheyya (pts1ed)
an5.28:6.2: aññova aññaṁ → añño vā aññaṁ (bj, sya-all, km); añño vā aññaṁ vā (si); añño aññaṁ (?)
an5.28:7.1: kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu → evaṁ bhāvite kho bhikkhave (sya-all)
